review: I love it. I am an Amazon Prime subscriber and also have an Amazon Fire Stick.  I am so sick of paying through the nose for a package of cable channels of which I watch maybe 4. They force me to pay for local network channels even though I have a high def, digital antenna that gives me all local network channels over the air in 1080P. They force me to pay a "Regional Sports Network Fee" even though I have no sports channels and any sports I do watch are on free local network channels. I am sick of 20 minutes of every hour of TV being infested with mindless commercials. As soon as I can ween my wife off the 2 cable channels that she watches I am kissing cable and all its service fees, equipment rental fees, surcharges, add-ons and taxes good-bye.
